title: Logo
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-store-components-logo

Logo is a VTEX block responsible for displaying an image logo for the store header.

`"vtex.store-components@3.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.
